languages.text: Этим монументальным весам тесно внутри Дворца Правосудия. Их втиснули в залу уже после прибытия Адептус Арбитес.
These monumental scales barely fit inside the Palace of Justice. They were crammed into the hall after the Adeptus Arbites arrived.
languages.original_text: Этим монументальным весам тесно внутри Дворца Правосудия. Их втиснули в залу уже после прибытия Адептус Арбитес.

traits.locale_text: These monumental scales barely fit inside the Palace of Justice. They were crammed into the hall after the Adeptus Arbites arrived.
These monumental scales barely fit inside the Palace of Justice. They were crammed into the hall after the Adeptus Arbites arrived.
These monumental scales barely fit inside the Palace of Justice. They were crammed into the hall after the Adeptus Arbites arrived.
These monumental scales barely fit inside the Palace of Justice. They were crammed into the hall after the Adeptus Arbites arrived.
These monumental scales barely fit inside the Palace of Justice. They were crammed into the hall after the Adeptus Arbites arrived.

languages.text: Diese monumentale Waage passt nur mit Mühe in den Justizpalast. Sie wurde nach der Ankunft des Adeptus Arbites in die Halle gebracht.
languages.original_text: These monumental scales barely fit inside the Palace of Justice. They were crammed into the hall after the Adeptus Arbites arrived.

traits.locale_text: Diese monumentale Waage passt nur mit Mühe in den Justizpalast. Sie wurde nach der Ankunft des Adeptus Arbites in die Halle gebracht.

languages.text: Cette balance monumentale tient à peine dans le palais de justice. C'est à se demander comment l'Adeptus Arbites a réussi à la faire entrer dans cette salle après avoir pris possession des lieux.
languages.original_text: These monumental scales barely fit inside the Palace of Justice. They were crammed into the hall after the Adeptus Arbites arrived.

traits.locale_text: Cette balance monumentale tient à peine dans le palais de justice. C'est à se demander comment l'Adeptus Arbites a réussi à la faire entrer dans cette salle après avoir pris possession des lieux.

languages.text: 正义大殿里几乎摆不下这座巨大的天平。帝国法务部成员来到这里之后，这座天平也被强行塞了进来。
languages.original_text: These monumental scales barely fit inside the Palace of Justice. They were crammed into the hall after the Adeptus Arbites arrived.

traits.locale_text: 正义大殿里几乎摆不下这座巨大的天平。帝国法务部成员来到这里之后，这座天平也被强行塞了进来。

languages.text: Esta monumental balanza apenas cabe en el Palacio de la Justicia. Probablemente la instalaran con la llegada del Adeptus Arbites.
languages.original_text: These monumental scales barely fit inside the Palace of Justice. They were crammed into the hall after the Adeptus Arbites arrived.

traits.locale_text: Esta monumental balanza apenas cabe en el Palacio de la Justicia. Probablemente la instalaran con la llegada del Adeptus Arbites.

languages.text: これらの巨大な天秤は、司法宮にようやく収まるほどの大きさだ。高等裁定局が到着してから、無理やりホールに押し込まれた。
languages.original_text: These monumental scales barely fit inside the Palace of Justice. They were crammed into the hall after the Adeptus Arbites arrived.

traits.locale_text: これらの巨大な天秤は、司法宮にようやく収まるほどの大きさだ。高等裁定局が到着してから、無理やりホールに押し込まれた。

languages.text: Bu devasa teraziler, Adalet Sarayı'na zar zor sığıyor. Adeptus Arbites geldikten sonra salona güç bela sıkıştırılmış olmalılar.
languages.original_text: These monumental scales barely fit inside the Palace of Justice. They were crammed into the hall after the Adeptus Arbites arrived.

traits.locale_text: Bu devasa teraziler Adalet Sarayı'na zar zor sığıyor. Adeptus Arbites geldikten sonra salona güç bela sıkıştırılmışlardır.
